segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t even notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s kind of sad how oblivious she is to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really struggling to reach the cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl is going to help him or just wait for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a moment that’s going to end badly for someone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water is just spreading everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are being really sneaky, but they’re also being really careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is already tilting, and he’s still reaching further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene straight out of a comedy, but it’s also kind of tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever realize what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
